home_message:
Welcome to Universe, the new application for members of the Erasmus Student Network !

This application gathers many tools used every day by ESNers, everything is at the same place, no need to search for the tools anymore !
Universe can also send you notifications: it listens to information sources (Facebook pages, livestreams, etc) and can tell you when something is happening ! Moreover, when you close its main frame, the application doesn't close itself, but rather goes background on your computer, still listening for news :)

tutorial_main_body: Welcome to your Universe! This is a tutorial mode, that will explain fastly how the application works. You can relaunch it anytime by clicking the logo, just there.
tutorial_menu_body: This is the browsing menu, where you can find all your favourites ESN platforms!
tutorial_section_body: This is a main platform of your Universe. To display it, you just have to left click it.
tutorial_delsite_body:
If you want to delete a platform, just right click it and press the delete button.
Please note that you cannot delete a main platform from your Universe.
tutorial_addsite_body: If you want to add a new source of information, you simply have to click this button!
tutorial_newsite_body: You just have to insert the URL of the website you want to follow here, and click the "Subscribe" button.
tutorial_end_body:
Now, you're good to go!
Don't hesitate to contact your webmaster if you need assistance :)
